export.title: Export Your Data
export.description: Download a backup of all your progress, including card reviews, sessions, achievements, and statistics.

import.title: Import Data
import.description: Restore your progress from a previously exported backup file. This will merge with your existing data.
import.successMessage: Import successful! Restored {{cards}} cards and {{sessions}} sessions.

delete.title: Danger Zone
delete.description: Permanently delete all your progress and start fresh. This action cannot be undone.
delete.confirmTitle: Are you absolutely sure? This will delete all your progress permanently!
delete.errorMessage: Failed to delete data. Please try again.
